tika-abh07t8:6_1: Rāgacaritā dosacaritā mohacaritā saddhācaritā buddhicaritā vitakkacaritā ceti chabbidhena caritasaṅgaho.
tika-abh07t8:8_0: 4. Parikammabhāvanā upacārabhāvanā appanābhāvanā ceti tisso bhāvanā.
tika-abh07t8:10_0: 5. Parikammanimittaṁ uggahanimittaṁ paṭibhāganimittañceti tīṇi nimittāni ca veditabbāni.
tika-abh07t8:11_1: Pathavīkasiṇaṁ āpokasiṇaṁ tejokasiṇaṁ vāyokasiṇaṁ nīlakasiṇaṁ pītakasiṇaṁ lohitakasiṇaṁ odātakasiṇaṁ
tika-abh07t8:11_2: ākāsakasiṇaṁ ālokakasiṇañceti imāni dasa kasiṇāni nāma.
tika-abh07t8:12_1: Uddhumātakaṁ vinīlakaṁ vipubbakaṁ vicchiddakaṁ vikkhāyitakaṁ vikkhittakaṁ hatavikkhittakaṁ lohitakaṁ puḷavakaṁ aṭṭhikañceti ime dasa asubhā nāma.
tika-abh07t8:13_1: Buddhānussati dhammānussati saṁghānussati sīlānussati cāgānussati devatānussati upasamānussati maraṇānussati
tika-abh07t8:13_2: kāyagatāsati ānāpānassati ceti imā dasa anussatiyo nāma.
tika-abh07t8:14_0: 9. Mettā karuṇā muditā upekkhā ceti imā catasso appamaññāyo nāma, brahmavihāroti ca pavuccati.
tika-abh07t8:17_1: Ākāsānañcāyatanādayo cattāro āruppā nāmāti sabbathāpi samathaniddese cattālīsa kammaṭṭhānāni bhavanti.
tika-abh07t8:19_0: 13. Caritāsu pana dasa asubhā kāyagatāsatisaṅkhātā koṭṭhāsabhāvanā ca rāgacaritassa sappāyā.
tika-abh07t8:20_0: 14. Catasso appamaññāyo nīlādīni ca cattāri kasiṇāni dosacaritassa.
tika-abh07t8:24_1: Sesāni pana sabbānipi kammaṭṭhānāni sabbesampi sappāyāni,
tika-abh07t8:27_1: buddhānussatiādīsu aṭṭhasu saññāvavatthānesu cāti dasasukammaṭṭhānesu upacārabhāvanāva sampajjati,
tika-abh07t8:36_0: 26.Nimittesu pana parikammanimittaṁ uggahanimittañca sabbatthāpi yathārahaṁ pariyāyena labbhanteva.
tika-abh07t8:37_2: tattha hi paṭibhāganimittamārabbha upacārasamādhi appanāsamādhi ca pavattanti.
tika-abh07t8:38_1: Ādikammikassa hi pathavīmaṇḍalādīsu nimittaṁ uggaṇhantassa tamārammaṇaṁ parikammanimittanti pavuccati,
tika-abh07t8:39_1: Yadā pana taṁ nimittaṁ cittena samuggahitaṁ hoti,
tika-abh07t8:40_1: Tathā samāhitassa panetassa tato paraṁ tasmiṁ uggahanimitte parikammasamādhinā bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa
tika-abh07t8:40_2: yadā tappaṭibhāgaṁ vatthudhammavimuccitaṁ paññattisaṅkhātaṁ bhāvanāmayamārammaṇaṁ citte sannisannaṁ samappitaṁ hoti,
tika-abh07t8:41_0: 31. Tato paṭṭhāya paripanthavippahīnā kāmāvacarasamādhisaṅkhātā upacārabhāvanā nipphannā nāma hoti.
tika-abh07t8:42_1: Tato paraṁ tameva paribhāganimittaṁ upacārasamādhinā samāsevantassa rūpāvacarapaṭhamajjhānamappeti.
tika-abh07t8:43_1: Tato paraṁ tameva paṭhamajjhānaṁ āvajjanaṁ samāpajjanaṁ adhiṭṭhānaṁ vuṭṭhānaṁ paccavekkhaṇā ceti imāhi
tika-abh07t8:43_2: pañcahi vasitāhi vasībhūtaṁ katvā vitakkādikamoḷārikaṅgaṁ pahānāya vicārādisukhumaṅgupattiyā padahato
tika-abh07t8:46_1: Ākāsavajjitakasiṇesu pana yaṁ kiñci kasiṇaṁ ugghāṭetvā laddhamākāsaṁ anantavasena parikammaṁ karontassa paṭhamāruppamappeti.
tika-abh07t8:47_0: 37. Tameva paṭhamāruppaviññāṇaṁ anantavasena parikammaṁ karontassa dutiyāruppamappeti.
tika-abh07t8:48_0: 38. Tameva paṭhamāruppaviññāṇābhāvaṁ pana “natthi kiñcī”ti parikammaṁ karontassa tatiyāruppamappeti.
tika-abh07t8:50_1: Avasesesu ca dasasu kammaṭṭhānesu buddhaguṇādikamārammaṇamārabbha parikammaṁ katvā tasmiṁ nimitte sādhukamuggahite tattheva parikammañca samādhiyati,
tika-abh07t8:51_1: Abhiññāvasena pavattamānaṁ pana rūpāvacarapañcamajjhānaṁ abhiññāpādakapañcamajjhānā vuṭṭhahitvā adhiṭṭheyyādikamāvajjetvā
tika-abh07t8:59_0: 43.Vipassanākammaṭṭhāne pana sīlavisuddhi cittavisuddhi diṭṭhivisuddhi kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhi maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhi
tika-abh07t8:61_0: 45. Aniccānupassanā dukkhānupassanā anattānupassanā ceti tisso anupassanā.
tika-abh07t8:62_1: Sammasanañāṇaṁ udayabbayañāṇaṁ bhaṅgañāṇaṁ bhayañāṇaṁ ādīnavañāṇaṁ nibbidāñāṇaṁ muccitukamyatāñāṇaṁ paṭisaṅkhāñāṇaṁ
tika-abh07t8:63_0: 47. Suññato vimokkho, animitto vimokkho, appaṇihito vimokkho ceti tayo vimokkhā.
tika-abh07t8:64_0: 48. Suññatānupassanā animittānupassanā appaṇihitānupassānā ceti tīṇi vimokkhamukhāni ca veditabbāni.
tika-abh07t8:65_1: Pātimokkhasaṁvarasīlaṁ indriyasaṁvarasīlaṁ ājīvapārisuddhisīlaṁ paccayasannissitasīlañceti catupārisuddhisīlaṁ sīlavisuddhi nāma.
tika-abh07t8:66_0: 50. Upacārasamādhi appanāsamādhi ceti duvidhopi samādhi cittavisuddhi nāma.
tika-abh07t8:68_0: 52. Tesameva ca nāmarūpānaṁ paccayapariggaho kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhi nāma.
tika-abh07t8:69_1: Tato paraṁ pana tathāpariggahitesu sappaccayesu tebhūmakasaṅkhāresu atītādibhedabhinnesu khandhādinayamārabbha
tika-abh07t8:69_4: anattā asārakaṭṭhenā”ti addhānavasena santativasena khaṇavasena vā sammasanañāṇena lakkhaṇattayaṁ sammasantassa
tika-abh07t8:69_5: tesveva paccayavasena khaṇavasena ca udayabbayañāṇena udayabbayaṁ samanupassantassa ca –
tika-abh07t8:73_1: Tathā paripanthavimuttassa pana tassa udayabbayañāṇato paṭṭhāya yā vānulomā tilakkhaṇaṁ vipassanāparamparāya
tika-abh07t8:74_1: Tassevaṁ paṭipajjantassa pana vipassanāparipākamāgamma “idāni appanā uppajjissatī”ti bhavaṅgaṁ vocchijjitvā
tika-abh07t8:74_2: uppannamanodvārāvajjanānantaraṁ dve tīṇi vipassanācittāni yaṁ kiñci aniccādilakkhaṇamārabbha parikammopacārānulomanāmena
tika-abh07t8:75_0: 56. Yā sikhāppattā, sā sānulomā saṅkhārupekkhā vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāti ca pavuccati.
tika-abh07t8:77_1: Tassānantarameva maggo dukkhasaccaṁ parijānanto samudayasaccaṁ pajahanto,
tika-abh07t8:78_1: Tato paraṁ dve tīṇi phalacittāni pavattitvā bhavaṅgapātova hoti,
tika-abh07t8:80_0: Hīne kilese sese ca, paccavekkhati vāna vā.
tika-abh07t8:85_0: 61. Tattha anattānupassanā attābhinivesaṁ muñcantī suññatānupassanā nāma vimokkhamukhaṁ hoti.
tika-abh07t8:88_0: 64. Tasmā yadi vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā anattato vipassati, suññato vimokkho nāma hoti maggo.
tika-abh07t8:89_0: 65. Yadi aniccato vipassati, animitto vimokkho nāma.
tika-abh07t8:90_2: appaṇihito vimokkho nāmāti ca maggo vipassanāgamanavasena tīṇi nāmāni labhati,
tika-abh07t8:91_1: Phalasamāpattivīthiyaṁ pana yathāvuttanayena vipassantānaṁ yathāsakaphalamuppajjamānampi vipassanāgamanavaseneva suññatādivimokkhoti ca pavuccati,
tika-abh07t8:91_2: ārammaṇavasena pana sarasavasena ca nāmattayaṁ sabbattha sabbesampi samameva ca.
tika-abh07t8:94_1: Ettha pana sotāpattimaggaṁ bhāvetvā diṭṭhivicikicchāpahānena pahīnāpāyagamano sattakkhattuparamo sotāpanno nāma hoti.
tika-abh07t8:95_1: Sakadāgāmimaggaṁ bhāvetvā rāgadosamohānaṁ tanukarattā sakadāgāmī nāma hoti sakideva imaṁ lokaṁ āgantvā.
tika-abh07t8:96_1: Anāgāmimaggaṁ bhāvetvā kāmarāgabyāpādānamanavasesappahānena anāgāmī nāma hoti anāgantvā itthattaṁ.
tika-abh07t8:97_1: Arahattamaggaṁ bhāvetvā anavasesakilesappahānena arahā nāma hoti khīṇāsavo loke aggadakkhiṇeyyoti.
tika-abh07t8:101_1: tattha yathākkamaṁ paṭhamajjhānādimahaggatasamāpattiṁ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha gate saṅkhāradhamme
tika-abh07t8:101_2: tattha tattheva vipassanto yāva ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ gantvā tato paraṁ adhiṭṭheyyādikaṁ pubbakiccaṁ katvā
tika-abh07t8:101_4: tassa dvinnaṁ appanājavanānaṁ parato vocchijjati cittasantati,
tika-abh07t8:102_2: arahato arahattaphalacittaṁ ekavārameva pavattitvā bhavaṅgapāto hoti,
tika-abh07t8:130_0: (Gha) porāṇehi anekāpi, katā yā pana vaṇṇanā;
tika-abh07t8:131_0: Na tāhi sakkā sabbattha, attho viññātave idha.
tika-abh07t8:136_2: abhidhammatthasaṅgaha”nti etena abhidheyyakaraṇappakārapakaraṇābhidhānāni abhidhammatthānaṁ idha saṅgahetabbabhāvadassanena
tika-abh07t8:136_6: Payojanaṁ pana saṅgahapadena sāmatthiyato dassitameva abhidhammatthānaṁ ekattha saṅgahe sati taduggahaparipucchādivasena tesaṁ sarūpāvabodhassa,
tika-abh07t8:137_0: Tattha ratanattayapaṇāmappayojanaṁ tāva bahudhā papañcenti ācariyā,
tika-abh07t8:137_4: sā ca vandaneyyavandakānaṁ khettajjhāsayasampadāhi diṭṭhadhammavedanīyabhūtā yathāladdhasampattinimittakassa
tika-abh07t8:137_7: Tasmā pakaraṇārambhe ratanattayapaṇāmakaraṇaṁ yathāraddhapakaraṇassa anantarāyena parisamāpanatthañceva
tika-abh07t8:137_9: Abhidheyyakathanaṁ pana viditābhidheyyasseva ganthassa viññūhi uggahaṇādivasena paṭipajjitabbabhāvato.
tika-abh07t8:137_13: sasaddhammagaṇuttamaṁ atulaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ abhivādiya abhidhammatthasaṅgahaṁ bhāsissanti sambandho.
tika-abh07t8:138_0: Tattha sammā sāmañca sabbadhamme abhisambuddhoti sammā sambuddho, bhagavā.
tika-abh07t8:138_1: So hi saṅkhatāsaṅkhatabhedaṁ sakalampi dhammajātaṁ yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇapaṭivedhavasena sammā sayaṁ vicitopacitapāramitāsambhūtena
tika-abh07t8:138_4: atha vā budhadhātussa jāgaraṇavikasanatthesupi pavattanato sammā sāmañca paṭibuddho anaññapaṭibodhito
tika-abh07t8:138_8: Yathāvuttavacanatthayogepi sammāsambuddhasaddassa bhagavati samaññāvasena pavattattā “atula”nti iminā viseseti.
tika-abh07t8:138_11: Atha vā sammitatthe akārapaccayavasena tulāya sammito tulo,
tika-abh07t8:138_14: natthi etassa vā tulo sadisoti atulo sadevake loke aggapuggalabhāvato.
tika-abh07t8:138_17: sattā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuppadā vā…pe…
tika-abh07t8:139_0: Ettāvatā ca hetuphalasattūpakārasampadāvasena tīhākārehi bhagavato thomanā katā hoti.
tika-abh07t8:139_7: Sakalalokanayanābhisekabhūtā pana lakkhaṇānubyañjanappaṭimaṇḍitā attabhāvasampatti rūpakāyasampadā nāma.
tika-abh07t8:139_11: Tadaññasattānaṁ pana lābhasakkārādinirapekkhacittassa yānattayamukhena sabbadukkhaniyyānikadhammadesanā payogo nāma.
tika-abh07t8:140_0: Tattha purimā dve phalasampadā “sammāsambuddha”nti iminā dassitā,
tika-abh07t8:140_3: tadupāyabhūtā pana hetusampadā dvīhipi sāmatthiyato dassitā tathāvidhahetubyatirekena tadubhayasampattīnamasambhavato,
tika-abh07t8:141_0: Tadevaṁ tividhāvatthāsaṅgahitathomanāpubbaṅgamaṁ buddharatanaṁ vanditvā idāni sesaratanānampi paṇāmamārabhanto āha “sasaddhammagaṇuttama”nti.
tika-abh07t8:141_1: Guṇībhūtānampi hi dhammasaṁghānaṁ abhivādetabbabhāvo sahayogena viññāyati yathā “saputtadāro āgatoti puttadārassāpi āgamana”nti.
tika-abh07t8:142_1: vaṭṭadukkhesu ca apatamāne katvā dhāretīti dhammo,
tika-abh07t8:142_6: nibbānassa ca ārammaṇabhāvena tassa tadatthasiddhihetutāya nippariyāyato labbhati,
tika-abh07t8:142_8: pariyattiyā ca tadadhigamahetutāyāti ubhinnampi pariyāyatoti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
tika-abh07t8:142_10: santo vā saṁvijjamāno na titthiyaparikappito attā viya paramatthato avijjamāno santo vā pasattho svākkhātatādiguṇayogato
tika-abh07t8:142_11: na bāhirakadhammo viya ekantanindito dhammoti saddhammo,
tika-abh07t8:142_12: gaṇo ca so aṭṭhannaṁ ariyapuggalānaṁ samūhabhāvato uttamo ca suppaṭipannatādiguṇavisesayogato, gaṇānaṁ,
tika-abh07t8:142_13: gaṇesu vā devamanussādi samūhesu uttamo yathāvuttaguṇavasenāti gaṇuttamo,
tika-abh07t8:143_3: Nibbattitaparamatthabhāvena abhi visiṭṭhā dhammā etthātiādinā abhidhammo,
tika-abh07t8:145_1: Evaṁ tāva yathādhippetappayojananimittaṁ ratanattayapaṇāmādikaṁ vidhāya idāni yesaṁ abhidhammatthānaṁ saṅgahaṇavasena idaṁ pakaraṇaṁ paṭṭhapīyati,
tika-abh07t8:145_2: te tāva saṅkhepato uddisanto āha “tattha vuttā”tyādi.
tika-abh07t8:145_4: khandhādivasena ca vuttā abhidhammatthā paramatthato sammutiṁ ṭhapetvā nibbattitaparamatthavasena cittaṁ viññāṇakkhandho,
tika-abh07t8:145_7: nibbānaṁ maggaphalānamārammaṇabhūto asaṅkhatadhammoti evaṁ catudhā catūhākārehi ṭhitāti yojanā.
tika-abh07t8:145_9: paramassa vā uttamassa ñāṇassa attho gocaroti paramattho.
tika-abh07t8:146_3: Satipi hi nissayasamanantarādipaccayena vinā ārammaṇena cittamuppajjatīti tassa taṁlakkhaṇatā vuttā,
tika-abh07t8:146_5: Cintenti vā etena karaṇabhūtena sampayuttadhammāti cittaṁ.
tika-abh07t8:146_7: Yathāpaccayaṁ hi pavattimattameva yadidaṁ sabhāvadhammo nāma.
tika-abh07t8:146_8: Evañca katvā sabbesampi paramatthadhammānaṁ bhāvasādhanameva nippariyāyato labbhati,
tika-abh07t8:146_10: Sakasakakiccesu hi dhammānaṁ attappadhānatāsamāropanena kattubhāvo ca,
tika-abh07t8:146_11: tadanukūlabhāvena sahajātadhammasamūhe kattubhāvasamāropanena paṭipādetabbadhammassa karaṇattañca pariyāyatova labbhati,
tika-abh07t8:146_12: tathānidassanaṁ pana dhammasabhāvavinimuttassa kattādino abhāvaparidīpanatthanti veditabbaṁ.
tika-abh07t8:148_0: Citaṁ kammakilesehi, citaṁ tāyati vā tathā;
tika-abh07t8:150_1: Na hi taṁ cittena vinā ārammaṇaggahaṇasamatthaṁ asati citte sabbena sabbaṁ anuppajjanato,
tika-abh07t8:150_2: cittaṁ pana kenaci cetasikena vināpi ārammaṇe pavattatīti taṁ cetasikameva cittāyattavuttikaṁ nāma.
tika-abh07t8:150_4: etena sukhādīnaṁ acetanattaniccattādayo vippaṭipattiyopi paṭikkhittā honti.
tika-abh07t8:151_8: Itarathā hi “ruppatī”ti avisesavacaneneva pariyattanti kiṁ sītādiggahaṇena,
tika-abh07t8:151_9: taṁ pana sītādinā phuṭṭhassa ruppanaṁ vibhūtataraṁ,
tika-abh07t8:151_12: na hi tattha upaghātakā sītādayo atthīti?
tika-abh07t8:151_16: atha vā taṁsabhāvānativattanato tattha rūpavohāroti alamatippapañcena.
tika-abh07t8:152_0: Bhavābhavaṁ vinanato saṁsibbanato vānasaṅkhātāya taṇhāya nikkhantaṁ,
